title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeOverview: Rishi and Saloni, two filmmakers travel to Manali to shoot a friend’s wedding. Rishi accidentally records the murder of a ‘dancing girl’ by the groom’s father and struggles with his conscience. As he tries to find out what happened, DSP Ghosh, a cop from West Bengal arrives in Manali, who is looking out for the same ‘dancing girl’ in a murder case.
